full_text: From: (b)(6). (b)(7)(C) @nytimes.com> Sent: Wed, 24 Jul 2019 22:44:28 -0400 Subject: hi and a question To: Lee Plourde (b)(6).(b)(7)(C)@bop.gov> hi Lee, hope you are well. We saw an article tonight on someting called RadarOnline reporting that Jeffrey Epstein attempted to commit suicide at the MCC (unsuccessfully.) Are you in a position to help me on that with some sort of confirmation or information. (Or to dispel its veracity?) thanks (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) (b)(6). (b)(7)(C) Reporter, The New York Times Office: 212-556 (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) Mobile: 914-672 (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) Email: (b)(6). (b)(7)(C) @nytimes.com (b)(6). (b)(7)(C)

text_blocks.content: From: (b)(6). (b)(7)(C) @nytimes.com> Sent: Wed, 24 Jul 2019 22:44:28 -0400 Subject: hi and a question To: Lee Plourde (b)(6).(b)(7)(C)@bop.gov>

hi Lee, hope you are well. We saw an article tonight on someting called RadarOnline reporting that Jeffrey Epstein attempted to commit suicide at the MCC (unsuccessfully.) Are you in a position to help me on that with some sort of confirmation or information. (Or to dispel its veracity?) thanks (b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
(b)(6). (b)(7)(C) Reporter, The New York Times Office: 212-556 (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) Mobile: 914-672 (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) Email: (b)(6). (b)(7)(C) @nytimes.com (b)(6). (b)(7)(C)

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as (b)(6) and (b)(7)(C), indicating potentially sensitive information.
